page.title: 14Making a Cup of Tea for Two
page.content: All people in the area find a good cup of tea a most refreshing drink. Here is the method for preparing a tasty pot. First boil a kettle full of water. Pour some of the boiling water into the teapot to warm it, and then empty it. Put 3 teaspoons of tea or 3 tea bags into the pot and pour in the boiling water. Wait 3 minutes for the tea to brew. Pour the tea into cups which contain a drop of milk and sugar to taste.
